n,m = map(int,input().split())
a = list(map(int,input().split())) 
b = list(map(int,input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == b[i]:
        count += 1

print(count)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))

max_rest = 0

for i in range(n-1):
    if a[i] == 1:
        max_rest += 1

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 0:
        max_rest += 1
    else:
        break

for i in range(n-1,-1,-1):
    if a[i] == 0:
        max_rest += 1
    else:
        break

print(max_rest)
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))

max_rest = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 1:
        max_rest += 1

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 0:
        max_rest += 1
    else:
        break

for i in range(n-1,-1,-1):
    if a[i] == 0:
        max_rest += 1
    else:
        break

print(max_rest)

n = int(input())
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

max_rest = 0
rest = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 1:
        rest += 1
    else:
        max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)
        rest = 0

max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)

print(max_rest)


n = int(input())
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
max_rest = 0
rest = 0
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 1:
        rest += 1
    else:
        max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)
        rest = 0

max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)

print(max_rest)
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

max_rest = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 1:
        max_rest += 1

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 0:
        max_rest += 1
    else:
        break

for i in range(n-1, -1, -1):
    if a[i] == 0:
        max_rest += 1
    else:
        break

print(max_rest)

n = int(input())
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

max_rest = 0
rest = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 1:
        rest += 1
    else:
        max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)
        rest = 0
max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)

print(max_rest)
